segments.text: I am sorry to say this but I seem to have lost the key to the safe .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where do you think you lost it ? Outside the hotel ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I believe so . How should I compensate for this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am afraid , Ma'am , you have to pay 100 US dollars since you lost the key .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ? 100 US dollars ? Is it covered by the insurance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am afraid no . It is not covered by this insurance .
segments.speaker: S2
